summary: When a tour guide breaks into America's Most Haunted House, a bit of amateur ghost hunting with friends turns into more than they could have ever imagined.
cast: Alex Arleo|Arielle Brachfeld|Graham Denman|Stephanie Greco|Carolina Groppa|Lynn Lowry|Howard McNair|Jason Owsley|Jon Briddell|Leigh Davis|Jon Kondelik|Maria Olsen|Shawn C. Phillips|Abigail Digna Prendes|Jeff Pride|Donne Lawson|Mindy Robinson|Ralph William Tarr|Alfred Rubin Thompson|Robert Younis|Lily Nguyen|Dan B. Underwood|Micaela Wittman|Rachel Galvin|Jessica Prendes
title: The Haunting of Whaley House
